## Bio

Experienced bioinformatician with over a decade of expertise in omics data analysis, target identification, and data visualization. Proficient in developing bioinformatics tools and managing large-scale biological datasets. Demonstrated leadership in designing workflows, automating pipelines, and collaborating with multidisciplinary teams.
